resume.contactMe: If I meet your companies needs and you would like to discuss further opportunities, please [contact me here](/contact).

contact.subHeader:
Fill out the form below and I will get back to you within 24 hours.  

I look forward to speaking with you.
contact.copyOfMessage: Receive a copy of your message

homepage.subheader:
I have over {{- years}} years experience as a Software Engineer and a Web App Developer.  

This website showcases some of my projects.

aboutMe.aboutMe: I am a Software Engineer located in San Antonio, Texas. I have worked with many different technologies: JavaScript, TypeScript, Node.js, React, and SASS are just a few examples. I have experience working on both personal as well as enterprise-level projects.

contactMe.disclaimer: If I sound like a good fit for your company, Please contact me by clicking below.

projects.subHeader: ### Below are a few personal projects that have each been created to resolve a different need. They all include many diverse technologies such as **React**, **Context**, **Redux**, **Hooks**, **Docker Containers**, **OAuth**, and more.
